title: Website Launch Workflow
description: Comprehensive 6-phase roadmap for taking a fresh SkyCMS installation to a fully functional website ready for content creators.

title: Phase 1: Design & Planning
description: Architecture understanding, site planning, brand identity, sitemap, wireframes, and content strategy.

title: Phase 2: Creating Layouts
description: Site-wide structure with DRY principles, HTML structure, responsive design, and common patterns.

title: Phase 3: Creating Templates
description: Page type blueprints, reusable components, editable regions, and File Manager integration.

title: Phase 4: Building Home Page
description: First live page creation, hero sections, featured content, SEO setup, testing, and publishing.

title: Phase 5: Building Initial Pages
description: Content pages, page hierarchy, internal linking, navigation setup, and page relationships.

title: Phase 6: Preparing for Handoff
description: Team setup, training, documentation, workflows, support, and launch checklist.

title: Pre-Launch Checklist
description: Technical validation, design completeness, content readiness, performance, security, and SEO verification.

title: Content Creator Onboarding Checklist
description: Access setup, training completion, first page walkthrough, and support resources.

title: Monthly Maintenance Tasks
description: Content review, performance monitoring, security updates, backup verification, and ongoing upkeep.

title: Style Guide Template
description: Fillable brand standards including logos, colors, typography, images, tone of voice, and component styles.

title: Training Document Template
description: Fillable training outline with step-by-step modules, troubleshooting, FAQ, and quick reference cards.

title: Content Workflow Template
description: Fillable workflow covering assignment, draft, review, revision, and publish stages with roles and responsibilities.

title: SkyCMS & Modern Approach
description: Deep dive into how SkyCMS enables modern web practices: componentization, workflows, separation of concerns, and quality practices.

title: SkyCMS vs. Alternatives - Comprehensive Comparison
description: Feature matrix, cost analysis, workflow comparison, and decision framework comparing SkyCMS with WordPress, Jekyll, Hugo, Gatsby, Contentful, Sanity, and others.

title: Developer Experience - SkyCMS vs. Alternatives
description: Detailed comparison of developer workflows, learning curves, deployment complexity, and daily development experience.

title: Developer Guides Index
description: Navigation hub for website launch guides, checklists, templates, and supporting resources.

title: SkyCMS Documentation Index
description: Complete documentation hub with learning paths, getting started, installation, configuration, and reference guides.
